overview: Hae-joo continues Dong-woo's story to writer Park. Dong-woo keeps calling men on weekends then one day, a man nicknamed uncle comes to Hae-joo. And Dong-woo and uncle got into a secret relationship with Hae-joo. Park, who listened to Hae-joo's story, gave Hae-joo a massage, and Park began to take over Hae-joo's body.
title: Dangerous Uncles 2
